summary: This is an email chain from July 2020 regarding a request for photographs. An individual is seeking copies of pictures taken by Jeffrey Epstein, and the sender provides two recent pictures of the subject to aid in identification, as the original Epstein pictures are from over a decade prior.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as the person who took pictures that another individual is seeking to obtain.

keyFacts: An individual is actively seeking to obtain photographs taken by Jeffrey Epstein.
The request indicates the Epstein photographs were taken over a decade prior to July 2020.
The sender provides two more recent pictures of the subject to help identify them in the older Epstein pictures.
The correspondence shows ongoing efforts by associates to locate and distribute material related to Epstein years after his death.
